com.aliyun.odps.mapred.lib
Class KeyFieldBasedPartitioner

java.lang.Object
  com.aliyun.odps.mapred.Partitioner
      com.aliyun.odps.mapred.lib.KeyFieldBasedPartitioner

public class KeyFieldBasedPartitioner
extends Partitioner

Defines a way to partition keys based on certain key fields (also see KeyFieldBasedComparator. The key specification supported is of the form -k pos1[,pos2], where, pos is of the form f[.c][opts], where f is the number of the key field to use, and c is the number of the first character from the beginning of the field. Fields and character posns are numbered starting with 1; a character position of zero in pos2 indicates the field's last character. If '.c' is omitted from pos1, it defaults to 1 (the beginning of the field); if omitted from pos2, it defaults to 0 (the end of the field).

getPartition

public int getPartition(Record keyRec,
                        Record valueRec,
                        int numReduceTasks)
Description copied from class: Partitioner
给定Key/Value和分区数（numPartitions），计算该Key/Value输出到哪个分区（分区索引从0到numPartitions-1）， 这里分区数（numPartitions）就是Reduce个数

此方法通常实现为对key的某个哈希函数，可以参考 HashPartitioner#getPartition(Object, Object, int)的实现

Specified by:
getPartition in class Partitioner
Parameters:
keyRec - 待分区的Key
valueRec - 待分区的Value
numReduceTasks - 分区数，既Reduce个数
Returns:
范围从0到numPartitions-1的分区索引
